title.native: ニル・アドミラリの天秤

description:
The Taishou era didn’t end in 15 years, but went on for another 25.

In order to protect her waning family, a girl resolves to marry a man she doesn’t even know the name of. However, just before the marriage was to take place, the girl’s younger brother mysteriously committed suicide by self-immolation and was found holding an old book in his hands.

Appearing before the bewildered young girl was the “Imperial Library Intelligence Asset Management Bureau”- more commonly referred to as “Fukurou”.

According to these men, there exists “Maremono”, which are books that greatly affects its readers. On top of that, ever since the incident involving the girl’s younger brother, she unwittingly gains the ability to see “Auras” (the sentiments of the Maremono which manifest as bright lights and are usually invisible to humans). It was as though fate were trying to drag the young girl in its flames.

And then, even though apprehensive, the girl chooses to venture outside her bird cage.

Jealousy, hatred, scorn, compassion and love. What awaited the girl was the darkness of betrayal that had already begun to bewitchingly inlay the imperial capital.

Toyed by and swayed within that darkness, will the young girl finally reach the truth after her struggles, or…?

(Source: VNDB)

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

Yukie Sakou is an animator and character designer.

__Height:__ 5'6"
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

He is married to someone from outside the industry since 2011, and two children were born from this relationship. 

[Website](https://shimonohiro.com) | [Blog](https://kimadou.exblog.jp) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shimono_kousiki) | [Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=38)

**Non-Anime Roles:**
• Lyney (Genshin Impact)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tekitounisatoi)

Satoi is a Japanese illustrator. She is the co-founder of Poni-Pachet alongside [Yumas](https://anilist.co/staff/286812/).

[Official Site](https://cametek.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/camelliaxxglitch/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/cametek)

**Camellia** is a Japanese musician, composer, and Vocaloid producer, most known for his tracks in various rhythm games, spanning Sound Voltex, Beatmania IIDX, DDR, and Bemani, among various others.

[Official Site](https://cametek.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/camelliaxxglitch/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/cametek)

[Official Site](https://cametek.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/camelliaxxglitch/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/cametek)

**Camellia** is a Japanese musician, composer, and Vocaloid producer, most known for his tracks in various rhythm games, spanning Sound Voltex, Beatmania IIDX, DDR, and Bemani, among various others.

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

__[Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/nocty-x-rucca/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mizoguchi_rucca)__

__Birthplace:__ Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Introduction:__
Takanori Mizoguchi, alternatively known by stage name RUCCA, is a Japanese lyricist and novelist. 

__Trivia:__
- He uses the name Mizoguchi Takanori (溝口貴紀) mainly when providing material to artists and idols.
- The name RUCCA is mainly used when providing material to the animation and games industry, but was also used once during a special occasion.
- The name L(R)UCCA) used mainly in context, or relation to record label _pure: infinity_, where he provides material for four-piece rock band 100% FREE
- The last name 溝口RUCCA is used as his pen-name when writing novels.

(Source: [Wikipedia (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%BA%9D%E5%8F%A3%E8%B2%B4%E7%B4%80), edited)
